title: An interview with Patrick Bourke
brief_description: Patrick Bourke was 16 when he grew onions with his father. Wanting to get out of this, he decided to join the navy. After convincing his father, he started work on his first ship H.M.A.S Adele, sighting subs and signalling wherever he was. Patrick retells some of his tales out at sea.
